name: Tilt World
description:
Oh no, you've lost all the watermelons for your picnic!

Fear not, those desperate for a picnic! As I, the 'god from above' will rotate the entire planet in order to make sure you can eat your watermelon!

Gameplay

Rotate the level in order to get the watermelon to the floating picnic box.

Controls

Rotate level - WASD / Left analog stick

Retry - R / Gamepad Y or Triangle

Sidenote

Sadly,  I won't be able to participate for the last 12+ hours of this jam. Because of this, the amount of levels is extremely limited. I tried my best to make sure the game was playable and had all the necessities for a game.

I might update the game to include more levels later.

Jam

This game was made for the 5th annual Kenney Game Jam (2021) with the theme 'Rotation'.
